are also joint gold sponsors in the 10th ASEAN Finance Ministers ' Investors Seminar ( AFMIS ) , a key gathering hosted by the Philippine government on May 20 , 2014 .

This year , the AFMIS aims to tackle ASEAN 's growth prospects , the ongoing initiatives of the ASEAN Finance Process to the ASEAN Economic Community , and the milestones and investment opportunities for individual economies and various country sectors .
